title: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with 30-hour battery life and crystal clear sound quality.

title: Smart Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant up to 50m.

title: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable 12-cup coffee maker with built-in grinder and temperature control for perfect brew every time.

title: Leather Backpack
description: Genuine leather backpack with multiple compartments, laptop sleeve, and adjustable padded straps.

title: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 8 programmable buttons, 16000 DPI sensor, and RGB lighting.

title: Gaming Keyboard
description: Mechanical gaming keyboard with RGB backlighting, hot-swappable switches, and anti-ghosting.
